entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
